original_title: Wishing you a happy Sinhala & Tamil New Year
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – New1st wishes all Sri Lankans a happy and properous Sinhala and Tamil New Year!
Mumbai Police arrest Sri Lankan and German for exchanging boarding passes at airport
Fighting breaks out between army and paramilitary unit in Sudan
Sri Lankans demand justice for the victims of the April 21st attacks
